name: Color Crush 2
description:
If you like Match 3 games, you’ll love playing Color Crush 2.

Color Crush 2 is a simple and relaxing game you can play when you don't know what you want to do

find and match 3 or more colors in the same shape and color

Features

  • 100 levels!
  • 5 Chapters.
  • Up to 6 difrent Colors / Shapes.
